name: InpatientSpecialCareNurseryNICUIINDNQI
title: Inpatient Special Care Nursery (NICU II) NDNQI
description: Inpatient Encounter for care of the newborn in the Special Care Baby Unit. SNOMED CT code(s). Created for NDNQI pressure ulcer and risk measures.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The clinical focus of this measure is the inpatient newborn in the Special Care Nursery (NICU Level II)),(Data Element Scope: Using the Quality Data Model, this data element will map to "Encounter."),(Inclusion Criteria: The newborn whose inpatient care was in the Special Care Nursery/Neonatal Level II Nursery.),(Exclusion Criteria: Outpatient care before or after birth such as prenatal and education, well child visits and home visits. Also excluded are inpatient well newborn and Neonatal Intensive Care Nursery Level III and Level IV.)

concept.display: Discharge from special care baby service (procedure)

contains.display: Discharge from special care baby service (procedure)
